This website displays the results of analysing Twitter activity for various
hashtags. The analysis code is covered by an MIT license and can be accessed
on [GitHub](https://github.com/kevinrue/twitter-stats).

This repository was forked from [Luke Zappia](https://github.com/lazappi/twitter-stats).
on [GitHub][]. It was created using the _[clamour][]_ package.

[GitHub]: (https://github.com/lazappi/twitter-stats)
[clamour]: https://lazappi.github.io/clamour "clamour package website"
